reviews.review_msg: She's a great prof and her lectures are always very easy to understand. The way she goes through the material makes it easier to grasp. The course itself is not easy, but her labs are very interesting. I would take a million classes with her, as her tests are very fair and you know what to expect. A+ for being a great human being.
Great lady. A young, modern & fun. prof that tries to make the class interesting. She's patient & her exams are fair.
Good, easy course. Don't need textbook, just follow her notes and you'll do good. Basic mt's, not tricky questions or anything like that.
